commit.message:
Push down dereference expression

Cherry-pick of https://github.com/prestosql/presto/commit/69ef6824dc7d1c42b7912ee4c50be55780042f09

Co-authored-by: qqibrow <qqibrow@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Pratham Desai <prathamd94@gmail.com>
Add session property to enable dereference pushdown

beforeCommit.message: Add session property to enable dereference pushdown

nodes.bodyText: why don't we have this before?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -401,7 +385,7 @@ protected Result pushDownDereferences(Context context, JoinNode joinNode, BiMap<
                             .addAll(leftNode.getOutputVariables())
                             .addAll(rightNode.getOutputVariables())
                             .build(),
-                    joinNode.getFilter(),
+                    joinNode.getFilter().map(expression -> replaceDereferences(expression, expressions)),

nodes.bodyText: Let's have this to match the name TestPushDownDereferences. Or you wanna call the other DeferencePushDown. Personally I prefer the latter.
